user.title: Fronius Smartmeter IP Setup
user.description: Enter the connection details for your Fronius Smartmeter API (e.g., from a Fronius Datamanager or GEN24 inverter with Smart Meter connected).

error.cannot_connect_http: Failed to connect: HTTP error. Check URL and ensure the device is reachable.
error.cannot_connect_request: Failed to connect: Network error. Check URL and network connection.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Check username and password if htaccess is used.
error.invalid_response: The API returned an invalid or unexpected JSON response.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred during connection setup.
error.already_configured: This Fronius Smartmeter IP (based on URL) is already configured.

abort.already_configured: This Fronius Smartmeter IP (based on URL) is already configured.
